text: hey guys it's mark Wiens here and i'm
about to eat one of the most popular and
widely available thai lunch specials
it could be considered probably the
hamburger and french fries combo of
Thailand it's a combination starting off
with rice on the bottom stir-fried
chicken I ordered chicken this time
which is stir-fried with a little bit of
soy sauce a little bit of sugar chilies
and the most essential ingredient which
is the Thai will be basil giving it the
signature flavor and I've also ordered
it with that with a chi dal which is a
fried egg on the side and that just
gives it the perfect extra protein touch
so if you're in Thailand and you're
looking for a good lunch
punch up how guy Chi now
just one of those flavors that that just
screams Thailand
it's delicious stuff the holy basil
gives it that awesome peppery peppery
flavor the egg on the side
you just can't get much better than this
for lunch that's for sure that wasn't
awesomely tasty lunch now if you like
